title: Name Change in New Store?
body:
Hi, just wondering where the name change is in the new store patch 6.10, it used to be under account and now that is gone i'm not sure where to look

Thanks

replies.body: scroll to the side and click the button labbeled account
At the top right of the store next to "RP" and the "Gifting Centre" is "Account". Click that and you'll see the servers and Summoner name change as options.
